meta.note: blog folder
Service folder
Content blocks used in page builder
About Us section with headline, subtitle, paragraphs, and image.
Blog listing section with search and category filtering
Booking section with contact information and appointment form details.
Contact section with HQ address, phone, hours, and email information.
Features section block
Footer section block
Embed a form in page content. Links to the forms collection.
Image gallery block
Hero section block
Locations section with branch information, address, hours, phone, and map.
Simple centered page header with badge, title, subtitle and description. Perfect for inner pages.
Portfolio section with before/after image slider and category filtering
Pricing section block
Promotions section with countdown timer and category filtering
Rich text content block
Safety protocols banner with title, subtitle, and safety points.
Service detail section showing comprehensive service information
Services grid section with title, subtitle, and list of services with icons.
Signature treatment section with steps, stats, price, and before/after images.
Statistics section displaying numerical statistics with icons
Team section displaying dentists with photos, names, and specialties.
Junction table linking block_team to dentists (M2M relationship)
Testimonials section block
Simple text block with title, content, and alignment options.
Why Choose Us section with title, subtitle, and 4 key points.
Blog post categories for organizing articles
Blog posts and articles. Write content to educate visitors and improve SEO.
Dentist profiles with photos, names, and specialties. Upload photos here - it works perfectly!
Fields for each form
Captured form responses
Reusable form definitions
Site-wide settings that affect your entire website. This is a single record - edit it to update global information.
Site navigation entries
Junction table for page blocks (M2A). Hidden from navigation.
Manage all pages on your website. Each page can contain multiple content blocks that you can arrange and customize.
Portfolio cases showing before/after treatment results
Portfolio categories for organizing portfolio cases
Blog posts and articles. Write content to educate visitors and improve SEO.
Promotion categories for organizing promotions
Promotions and special offers
Organize your services into categories. Categories help visitors find related services easily.
Manage your service offerings. Each service can be categorized and linked to locations and dentists.
Website collections
Placeholder image URL for About section
Select which form to embed
Optional title above the form
Optional description text
e.g.
Small badge text above title (e.g. '')
Main page title (e.g. 'Our Work')
Subtitle below the title
Longer description paragraph
Array of safety points: { label }
Array of steps: { number, title, description }
Optional intro or description for the team section
Select dentists to display in this team block. Create dentists in the Dentists collection first.
Block title (optional)
Subtitle text (optional)
Main content (HTML supported)
Text alignment
Background color (optional)
URL-friendly identifier
URL-friendly version of title
Short summary for listings
Reading time in minutes
SEO meta title
SEO meta description
Upload doctor photo image - THIS WORKS!
External URL fallback if photo not uploaded
Custom validation rules
Select/radio choices
Used to embed form in blocks
Default CTA text
Optional redirect after submit
Send email alerts
Email to notify
Your website name. Appears in the header, footer, and browser tab. Example: 'Tooth Box Dental Clinic'.
Brief description of your business/website. Used in search engine results and social media sharing.
Your website logo. Displayed in the header. Recommended: PNG with transparent background, at least 200px wide.
Small icon shown in browser tabs. Should be square, recommended size: 32x32px or 64x64px.
External URL override
Link to internal page
Nest under another navigation item
Display order in navigation menu. Lower numbers appear first. Each item should have a unique number.
Nested items
The page title that appears in the browser tab and search results. Make it descriptive and clear.
URL-friendly version of the title. Use lowercase letters, numbers, and hyphens only. Example: 'about-us' creates the URL '/about-us'. Leave blank to auto-generate from title.
Draft: Not visible on website | Published: Visible to everyone | Archived: Hidden but kept for reference
Add and arrange content blocks to build your page. Drag blocks to reorder them.
Draft: Still editing, not visible | Published: Live on website | Archived: Hidden but kept
The blog post title. Make it engaging and descriptive. This appears at the top of the article and in search results.
URL-friendly version of the title. Example: 'how-to-care-for-teeth' creates '/blog/how-to-care-for-teeth'. Leave blank to auto-generate.
The main article content. Use headings, lists, and formatting to make it easy to read. Include relevant keywords naturally.
Short summary (1-2 sentences) shown in blog listings. If left empty, the first paragraph of content will be used.
Main image for the blog post. Shown in listings and at the top of the article. Recommended: 1200x630px for best results.
Select the author of this post. Usually yourself or a team member.
When this post was or will be published. Used for sorting and display. Leave empty to use current date when publishing.
SEO title for search engines (50-60 characters). If empty, post title will be used.
SEO description for search results (150-160 characters). Write a compelling summary.
Category name. Example: 'General Dentistry', 'Cosmetic Dentistry', 'Orthodontics'.
URL-friendly version of the category name.
Brief description of what services belong in this category.
Icon identifier for this category (optional). Used for visual representation.
Order in which categories appear. Lower numbers appear first.
The name of the service as it appears on your website. Example: 'Teeth Whitening' or 'Dental Implants'.
URL-friendly version of the service name. Used in the service detail page URL. Example: 'teeth-whitening' creates '/services/teeth-whitening'.
Draft: Not visible | Published: Visible on website | Archived: Hidden
Select the category this service belongs to. Categories help organize services on your website.
Brief description (1-2 sentences) shown in service listings and cards. Keep it concise and compelling.
Full detailed description of the service. Use formatting, lists, and headings to make it easy to read.
How long the service typically takes. Example: '30-45 minutes' or '1-2 hours'.
Starting price for this service. Example: '2,500' or 'Starting at $99'. Leave empty if pricing varies.
Main image displayed at the top of the service detail page. Recommended size: 1200x600px or larger.
SEO title for search engines. If empty, service name will be used.
SEO description for search results (150-160 characters).
Array of key benefits: { title, description }
